db:abstract.db:para: Provides the projection matrix that is used to define a Camera for 3D scene.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.5.

db:section.db:title: aspectRatio : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current aspect ratio of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: bottom : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current bottom plane of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: farPlane : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current near plane of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: fieldOfView : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current field of view of the camera lens in degrees.

db:section.db:title: left : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current left plane of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: nearPlane : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current near plane of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] projectionMatrix : matrix4x4
db:section.db:para: Holds the current projection matrix of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: projectionType : enumeration
db:section.db:para: Holds the type of the camera projection.

db:section.db:title: right : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current right plane of the camera lens.

db:section.db:title: top : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the current top plane of the camera lens.
